rule_text: Various game effects can cause a unit to be destroyed. When a player's unit is destroyed, it is removed from the game board and returned to his reinforcements.   29.1 When a player assigns hits that were produced against his units, he chooses a number of his units to be destroyed equal to the number of hits produced against his units.   29.2 Forcing a player to remove a unit from the board by reducing the number of command tokens in his fleet pool does not count as destroying a unit.
